name: app/util.js
app/validator.js
set
description: Class parameters

name: cacheExerciseImports
description: The function caches imports in local scope for later to be referenced as a string

name: getBookmarks
description: Ajax get request to the Zeeguu API to get new bookmarks

params.name: args
params.description:
is matrix of exercise name and number of bookmarks,
        example: [[1,3],[2,4]] 3 bookmarks for ex1 and 4 bookmarks for ex2

return.description: matrix of exercises similar to its input

name: validateSet
description:
Given the set and the bookmarks create a new set for generator
 Three possibilities:
 number of bookmarks == 0 then show no bookmarks page
 number of bookmarks < requested number then generate exercises that fit
 number of bookmarks >= requested number simply generate exercises

name: enoughBookmarks
description:
number of bookmarks >= requested number simply generate exercises
Assumes the given set has valid minimal sizes for exercises

name: notEnoughBookmarks
description: Number of bookmarks < requested number, generate exercises that fit

name: noBookmarkPage
description:
Number of bookmarks == 0 then show no bookmarks page
Signals the generator to terminate, load no bookmark page

name: isProperEx
description: Compares the minimum requirement for the given ex and the assigned amount

params.name: exSize,
params.description: the amount the ex is generated

return.description: {boolean}, true if the minReq >= givenAmount, else false

name: validSize
description: Getter for final valid size of the generated bookmarks

name: validSet
description: Getter for final valid set for exercise generator
